name: Ghost Vacuumer
description:
A game about vacuuming and shooting ghosts while exploring a dungeon. Use the power of vacuum to capture ghosts and shoot them.

Controls:
Arrow Keys: Move
Z: Vacuum
X: Shoot

Assets Used:

  • Fonts: https://opengameart.org/content/kenney-fonts
  • Ghosts: https://opengameart.org/content/roguelite
  • Hearts: https://opengameart.org/content/heart-pixel-art
  • Main Character: https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-urban-pack
  • Map Tiles: https://opengameart.org/content/roguelikerpg-pack-1700-tiles
